extendedInfo.description: NOTE: This free version does not include the entire Conscious Parenting 101 video set, only the basic concepts video is included. The full Conscious Parenting 101 Video Set includes the following videos:1. Conscious Parenting 101 â Begin the path towards becoming a more conscious parent with this introduction to some key concepts. *Included with the version2. Mission: Possible ~ Believe, Perceive, and You Will Achieve the Life You Deserve and Desire! - This motivational video consists of inspirational quotes and an exhilarating musical score that is meant to inspire you to embrace life and the many dreams you have for yourself and your family.  This video is available for download with or without narration. *Not included in this version. Only the full version includes this video.3. Bedtime Affirmations: Sleepy Time Reflections for Children - This video will lull your little one into a peaceful sleep each night with soothing binaural beats and self-affirmations.  As we know, the thoughts we have about ourselves are directly related to how we feel about ourselves, and consequently how we treat ourselves and others. With this video, you can help your child to drift off to sleep with loving and happy declarations about the special person they are. *Not included in this version. Only the full version includes this video.As parents, we aim to raise happy and healthy children that will eventually enter the world well equipped for a successful life on their chosen path. From the day our children are born, most parents are given plenty of directives on strategies to most efficiently and effectively feed their physical bodies, while much less attention and guidance is given to the ways we can positively nurture their emotional and spiritual growth. Yet these areas of development are just as crucial in the overall well-being of our children. For that reason, SWB International was inspired to develop the Conscious Parenting 101 Video Set that parents could use as a channel in which to start raising their own consciousness as well as the consciousness of their children.When we are living consciously, we are more connected to ourselves and to our children.  We are also âbeing the change we hope to see in the worldâ and raising children that will do the same. These videos are easy to follow and provide simple concepts, ideas, and motivations for parents that wish to raise the level of consciousness in their homes.
